title: Who Truly Owns Everything? | Sri Chanchalapathi Dasa @ChanchalapathiDas
speaker: HG Chanchalapathi Dasa

segments.key_quote: We must use all of this to serve Rama
segments.summary: The speaker establishes that everything, including our bodies and strength, belongs to Sri Rama, and we should use them in His service.
segments.transcript: I have come into this world, I have this Panchabhuta Sharira, Antribhuta Sharira, Sukshma Sharira. To whom does all this belong? Am I the owner of all this? Am I the owner of this body and the owner of the senses? Am I the owner of myself? To whom do I belong? Oh, we have this body, whatever strength we have, may not be much, but all of this belongs to Sri Rama, and we all belong to Sri Rama. We must use all of this to serve Rama. This is the thinking of a Bhatta. This world belongs to the Lord. Isha Vasya Midam Sarvam. Everything that is there, everything, the Lord is the owner. The Lord is the owner.
